snippet.title: Digital Paintball REDUX Trailer
snippet.description:
A little trailer I put together for the re-release of the old Half Life 1 mod, Digital Paintball REDUX. REDUX will feature new fields, textures, markers, and the like. An online multiplayer simulation of professional paintball.

REDUX is completely free, provided you own Half Life 1. It has finally been released on STEAM!
